summary: replace a lot of music of the skyrim directory by the music of the anim fairy tail.
descriptionHtml:
Excuse me for my english i am frech.

Why i do this mod : i like the skyrim music but after long time play i was enouth of that.
I try to replace the main music buy an other that i like : THE FAIRY TAIL MUSIC!

I replace combat, town, main menu, level up, some donjon and explore music.

this not delete the original theme of skyrim!

to uninstall just delete the music folder in the data folder.

I hope you like it, if you have any sugestion plse mel me.

thanks bethesda for all of theire work and fairy tail very good anime.
author: luckytln
